queries.compiledQueryString: select distinct source from no_flab_brief.articles order by source
queries.inputQueryString: select distinct source from no_flab_brief.articles order by source

queries.compiledQueryString: select distinct beat from no_flab_brief.articles where beat is not null order by beat
queries.inputQueryString: select distinct beat from no_flab_brief.articles where beat is not null order by beat

queries.compiledQueryString:
select 
    source, 
    title, 
    beat, 
    region, 
    strftime(published_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M') as date,
    link
from no_flab_brief.articles
where 
    (source like '${inputs.selected_source.value}')
    and (beat like '${inputs.selected_beat.value}')
    and published_date >= '${inputs.date_range.start}'
    and published_date <= '${inputs.date_range.end}'
order by published_date desc
queries.inputQueryString:
select 
    source, 
    title, 
    beat, 
    region, 
    strftime(published_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M') as date,
    link
from no_flab_brief.articles
where 
    (source like '${inputs.selected_source.value}')
    and (beat like '${inputs.selected_beat.value}')
    and published_date >= '${inputs.date_range.start}'
    and published_date <= '${inputs.date_range.end}'
order by published_date desc

queries.compiledQueryString:
select 
    journalist_name, 
    outlet, 
    beat, 
    region, 
    handle_link, 
    status 
from no_flab_brief.verifiers
order by beat, journalist_name
queries.inputQueryString:
select 
    journalist_name, 
    outlet, 
    beat, 
    region, 
    handle_link, 
    status 
from no_flab_brief.verifiers
order by beat, journalist_name
